title: Local laptop runner: local video path â†’ local bundle directory
scope: Provide a CLI command that runs the MVP pipeline on a local laptop.
Inputs are local file paths; outputs are written to a local bundle directory.
Runner produces deterministic manifests and validates outputs.
acceptance: CLI accepts `--video` local path and `--out` local bundle dir and completes successfully on a sample clip.
Outputs conform to the bundle contract and validate passes.
Failure modes are explicit and actionable (missing ffmpeg, missing model weights).

deliverables.title: Local runner command implementation
acceptance: Runner command exists and emits a contract-valid bundle locally.
Ingest errors have explicit exit codes and actionable messages.

subtasks.title: Add local runner CLI entry and validate outputs.
done_when: CLI supports a local run that writes overlay/tracks/report outputs.
validate passes on the output bundle.
